long_description: Add some cargo capacity to your Weehoo iGo bicycle trailer with the Weehoo Cargo Basket. Its large space is perfect for hauling groceries or other everyday items. Weehoo Cargo Basket. installs on the iGo Pro, iGo Two Passenger, and iGo Venture bicycle trailers, sold separately. Fits on the iGo Pro only with the child seat removed; assembles in 5 min.
short_description: Add some cargo capacity to your Weehoo iGo bicycle trailer with the Weehoo Cargo Basket. Its large space is perfect for hauling groceries or other everyday items.
